com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport

Class SecurityScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.SecurityScheme

  • public final class SecurityScheme
extends Object
    A named container for SecurityAccessPermissions and SecurityGrantPermissions that can be used to provide default security information for a newly created Item.
    Since:
    2.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecurityScheme(String name, Collection<SecurityAccessPermission> accessPermissions, Collection<SecurityGrantPermission> grantPermissions)
      Constructs a new SecurityScheme, setting all mandatory fields.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<SecurityAccessPermission> getAccessPermissions()
      Gets the SecurityAccessPermissions that this SecurityScheme contains.
      Collection<SecurityGrantPermission> getGrantPermissions()
      Gets the SecurityGrantPermissions that this SecurityScheme contains.
      String getName()
      Gets a String containing the name of this SecurityScheme.
      String getSecurityPermissionsSignpost()
      Gets a String indicating whom to contact to obtain increased SecurityAccessPermissions.
      void setSecurityPermissionsSignpost(String securityPermissionsSignpost)
      Sets the indicator of whom to contact to obtain increased SecurityAccessPermissions to the specified String.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SecurityScheme

        public SecurityScheme(String name,
              Collection<SecurityAccessPermission> accessPermissions,
              Collection<SecurityGrantPermission> grantPermissions)
        Constructs a new SecurityScheme, setting all mandatory fields.
        Parameters:
        name - A String containing a name for this SecurityScheme.
        accessPermissions - The SecurityAccessPermissions that this SecurityScheme contains.
        grantPermissions - The SecurityGrantPermissions that this SecurityScheme contains.
